snippet: The Odissi dancer Sujata Mohapatra performed seven roles from the Ramayana on Monday, the opening night of the Erasing Borders festival of Indian dance.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance by Sujata Mohapatra on opening night of the Erasing Borders festival of Indian dance at the Club at LaMaMa.
lead_paragraph: The Odissi dancer Sujata Mohapatra performed seven roles from the Ramayana on Monday, the opening night of the Erasing Borders festival of Indian dance.

headline.seo: Odissi Dancer Sujata Mohapatra at Erasing Borders Festival
headline.main: One Soloist Takes on Seven Characters
headline.print_headline: One Soloist Takes On Seven Characters
